titleStmt.title: J. A. Williams et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG4794

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Jamestown Ky
His Excellency Governor Bramlette
Sir

There has been a fine assessed in the Russell Circuit Court against Jonas Brodshaw for tippling for the amount sum of thirty five dollars and We the undersigned citizens of said county and neighbors of said Brodshaw Petition to you to have the amount of the fine due the commonwealth remitted and think that an account of his haveing a large helpless family on hands and being almost unable to make them a support that said fine ought to be remitted and we consider that it will be an act which will be of great benefit to his family said Brodshaw is scarsely able to work and is entirely destitute of means to pay the said fine consequently we will expect that strong your magnanimity that you will comply with the request of the numerous friends who appeal to you in his behalf that said fine will be remitted

J. A. Williams
Wm Barnes
J B Johnson
Achilles Nelson
John Rinnet
J A Stokes
Davis Flanagan
Jorge W Brakers
Jocyrus E. Wilson
John Dunkan
D. S. Hill
L. Hammonds
S. W. Hughes
J. H. M. Battery
Samuel Jeffries
John W. Warren
M. I. Hopper
A. Waldridge
G W. Twidwell
Edmond Cook Jr
Mason F Carnagie
H.. H. Wade
T C Popplewell
J B Hill
James M Beshears
Jacks Coffey
W M Camlin
Isham Bohn Capt
A. G. Huegh
A C Simpson
Abner Jones
Reuben Dunbar
James L Coe
Wm. N. Stokes
M Chamberlain

John Johnson
James Dunbar Sen
Henry C George

George Brayan

N G Wills Capt 13 Ky Cav

Russell Cir Ct
vs
Jonas Bradshaw
Remtd
29th Apl/64
$35 --
Tipling
